an2.118-129:2.1: 11 Hopes that are Hard to Give Up
an2.118-129:4.1: “These two hopes are hard to give up.
an2.118-129:4.3: The hope for wealth and the hope for long life.
an2.118-129:4.4: These are two hopes that are hard to give up.”
an2.118-129:6.1: “These two people are rare in the world.
an2.118-129:6.3: One who takes the initiative, and one who is grateful and thankful.
an2.118-129:6.4: These are the two people who are rare in the world.”
an2.118-129:8.1: “These two people are rare in the world.
an2.118-129:8.3: One who is satisfied, and one who satisfies others.
an2.118-129:8.4: These are the two people who are rare in the world.”
an2.118-129:10.1: “These two people are hard to satisfy in the world.
an2.118-129:10.3: One who continually hoards wealth, and one who continually wastes wealth.
an2.118-129:10.4: These are the two people who are hard to satisfy in the world.”
an2.118-129:12.1: “These two people are easy to satisfy in the world.
an2.118-129:12.3: One who does not continually hoard wealth, and one who does not continually waste wealth.
an2.118-129:12.4: These are the two people who are easy to satisfy in the world.”
an2.118-129:14.1: “There are two conditions for the arising of greed.
an2.118-129:14.3: Beauty, and focusing the mind in the wrong way.
an2.118-129:14.4: These are the two conditions for the arising of greed.”
an2.118-129:16.1: “There are two conditions for the arising of hate.
an2.118-129:16.4: These are the two conditions for the arising of hate.”
an2.118-129:18.1: “There are two conditions for the arising of wrong view.
an2.118-129:18.3: The call of another and irrational focus.
an2.118-129:18.4: These are the two conditions for the arising of wrong view.”
an2.118-129:20.1: “There are two conditions for the arising of right view.
an2.118-129:20.3: The call of another and rational focus.
an2.118-129:20.4: These are the two conditions for the arising of right view.”
an2.118-129:22.3: A light offense and a serious offense.
an2.118-129:24.3: An offense with corrupt intention and an offense without corrupt intention.
an2.118-129:26.3: An offense requiring rehabilitation and an offense not requiring rehabilitation.
